Post.title: Hello World
Post._content:
Welcome to [Hexo](https://hexo.io/)! This is your very first post. Check [documentation](https://hexo.io/docs/) for more info. If you get any problems when using Hexo, you can find the answer in [troubleshooting](https://hexo.io/docs/troubleshooting.html) or you can ask me on [GitHub](https://github.com/hexojs/hexo/issues).
<!--more-->
## Quick Start

### Create a new post

``` bash
$ hexo new "My New Post"
```

More info: [Writing](https://hexo.io/docs/writing.html)

### Run server

``` bash
$ hexo server
```

More info: [Server](https://hexo.io/docs/server.html)

### Generate static files

``` bash
$ hexo generate
```

More info: [Generating](https://hexo.io/docs/generating.html)

### Deploy to remote sites

``` bash
$ hexo deploy
```

More info: [Deployment](https://hexo.io/docs/one-command-deployment.html)

Welcome to [Hexo](https://hexo.io/)! This is your very first post. Check [documentation](https://hexo.io/docs/) for more info. If you get any problems when using Hexo, you can find the answer in [troubleshooting](https://hexo.io/docs/troubleshooting.html) or you can ask me on [GitHub](https://github.com/hexojs/hexo/issues).
<!--more-->
## Quick Start

### Create a new post

``` bash
$ hexo new "My New Post"
```

More info: [Writing](https://hexo.io/docs/writing.html)

### Run server

``` bash
$ hexo server
```

More info: [Server](https://hexo.io/docs/server.html)

### Generate static files

``` bash
$ hexo generate
```

More info: [Generating](https://hexo.io/docs/generating.html)

### Deploy to remote sites

``` bash
$ hexo deploy
```

More info: [Deployment](https://hexo.io/docs/one-command-deployment.html)

Post.title: Full GC
Post._content:
## JVM Full GCFull Garbage Collection "Full GC" JVM Full GC Full GC ## Full GC Full GC Full GC JVM Old GenerationMetaspaceStop-The-WorldSTW Full GC ### 1.1 Full GC | | | | |------------------------| --- | --- | | **** | | | | ** (Metaspace) ** | | Spring Groovy | | `System.gc()`**** | Full GC | | | **GC ** | GC CMS "Concurrent Mode Failure" G1 "Humongous Allocation Failure" | G1 Region | ### 1.2 Full GC Full GC 1. **** STW 2. ****Full GC CPU GC -> -> 3. **** ## Full GC 2MB 5 Full GC 2MB 80KB Full GC ### 1 + ****Heap Dump`ConcurrentHashMap` + ****GC + **** - **** `Map` Caffeine Guava Cache - **** Redis JVM ### 2 + **** Kafka + **** Full GC + **** - **** ID - **** Snappy LZ4 - **** ### 3 + **** `ArrayList` + ****DAO + **** - **** - **** MyBatis `Cursor` - **** `SELECT *` ### 4 `ThreadLocal` + **** + **** `ThreadLocal` `remove()` + **** **** `ThreadLocal` `try-finally` `finally` `remove()` ```java try { userContextHolder.set(userInfo); // ... } finally { userContextHolder.remove(); // } ``` - ****`**TransmittableThreadLocal**` TTL ### 5 + ****Full GC Metaspace Metaspace + ****CGLibASM + **** - **** `Method``Field` - **** ## Full GC ### | | | | | | --- | --- | --- | --- | | **Full GC ** | /STW / | `jstat`
, Prometheus + Grafana, SkyWalking | **** Prometheus | | **** | / | Arthas, JProfiler, JVisualVM | **** | | **** | P99/P95 CPU | SkyWalking/Zipkin, `top -Hp` | **** JVM | ** ( Prometheus + Grafana ):** 1. `jmx_exporter` `jvm_gc_full_count` (Full GC ) 2. Grafana Full GC > 1 / 5 STW > 500ms 3. -> Full GC -> ### ** ** #### 1 () **GC ** JVM GC ```bash # JDK9+ -Xlog:gc*:file=/var/log/jvm/gc-%t.log:time,level,tags:filecount=10,filesize=100m # JDK8 -XX:+PrintGCDetails -XX:+PrintGCDateStamps -XX:+PrintHeapAtGC ``` ** (Heap Dump) ** **Full GC ** ```bash # jmap jmap -dump:live,format=b,file=heap.hprof # Arthas heapdump /tmp/heap.hprof ``` #### 2 GC () GC 1. **** `Allocation Failure` ()`Metadata GC Threshold` () `System.gc()` () 2. **** GC 90% 85% GC 3. **** Full GC + -> -> #### 3 () MAT (Memory Analyzer Tool) 1. ** (Dominator Tree)**Retained Size 2. ** (Path to GC Roots)** 3. ****Class Loader Explorer #### 4 () + **** + **** + **** Full GC ### K8s K8s Pod 1. ****JVM `limit` GC 2. **** - ** ()** Prometheus `container_memory_usage_bytes` JVM GC Pod - ** ( Pod)** `kubectl exec -it -- /bin/bash` `jstat``jmap` - ** ()** **Sidecar ** GC SkyWalkingArthas APM ## E2E Full GC ### 1 (1 ) + **** + **** Sentinel + **** ### 2 (1-3 ) JVM + **** - **** Redis - **** `StringBuilder` `String` - **** `try-with-resources` IO + **JVM ** - G1 - (`-XX:NewRatio`) (`-XX:MaxGCPauseMillis`) ### 3 (1-3 ) Full GC + **** - Caffeine + Redis - Redis Key + **** - - Flink + **** - Full GC -> -> - ## Full GC Full GC JVM 1. **** Full GC JVM 2. **** 3. ****GC Full GC ****

, Prometheus + Grafana, SkyWalking | **** Prometheus | | **** | / | Arthas, JProfiler, JVisualVM | **** | | **** | P99/P95 CPU | SkyWalking/Zipkin, `top -Hp` | **** JVM | ** ( Prometheus + Grafana ):** 1. `jmx_exporter` `jvm_gc_full_count` (Full GC ) 2. Grafana Full GC > 1 / 5 STW > 500ms 3. -> Full GC -> ### ** ** #### 1 () **GC ** JVM GC ```bash # JDK9+ -Xlog:gc*:file=/var/log/jvm/gc-%t.log:time,level,tags:filecount=10,filesize=100m # JDK8 -XX:+PrintGCDetails -XX:+PrintGCDateStamps -XX:+PrintHeapAtGC ``` ** (Heap Dump) ** **Full GC ** ```bash # jmap jmap -dump:live,format=b,file=heap.hprof # Arthas heapdump /tmp/heap.hprof ``` #### 2 GC () GC 1. **** `Allocation Failure` ()`Metadata GC Threshold` () `System.gc()` () 2. **** GC 90% 85% GC 3. **** Full GC + -> -> #### 3 () MAT (Memory Analyzer Tool) 1. ** (Dominator Tree)**Retained Size 2. ** (Path to GC Roots)** 3. ****Class Loader Explorer #### 4 () + **** + **** + **** Full GC ### K8s K8s Pod 1. ****JVM `limit` GC 2. **** - ** ()** Prometheus `container_memory_usage_bytes` JVM GC Pod - ** ( Pod)** `kubectl exec -it -- /bin/bash` `jstat``jmap` - ** ()** **Sidecar ** GC SkyWalkingArthas APM ## E2E Full GC ### 1 (1 ) + **** + **** Sentinel + **** ### 2 (1-3 ) JVM + **** - **** Redis - **** `StringBuilder` `String` - **** `try-with-resources` IO + **JVM ** - G1 - (`-XX:NewRatio`) (`-XX:MaxGCPauseMillis`) ### 3 (1-3 ) Full GC + **** - Caffeine + Redis - Redis Key + **** - - Flink + **** - Full GC -> -> - ## Full GC Full GC JVM 1. **** Full GC JVM 2. **** 3. ****GC Full GC ****
